body_html:
Hi @lmthang

The layers.linear is now used instead.

The cell_output now uses the logits projected.

Note: I had to add an extra argument, num_decoder_symbols, to the simple_decoder_fn_inference.

Please let me know if you have more code blocks that you would like to change.

Furthermore, I assume the only major challenge left (before writing docstrings and building) is the equality test mentioned by @ebrevdo ? (please see latest "requested changes").
body_text:
Hi @lmthang
The layers.linear is now used instead.
The cell_output now uses the logits projected.
Note: I had to add an extra argument, num_decoder_symbols, to the simple_decoder_fn_inference.
Please let me know if you have more code blocks that you would like to change.
Furthermore, I assume the only major challenge left (before writing docstrings and building) is the equality test mentioned by @ebrevdo ? (please see latest "requested changes").
body:
Hi @lmthang 

The `layers.linear` is now used [instead](https://github.com/alrojo/tensorflow/blob/dynamic_decoder/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/kernel_tests/seq2seq_test.py#L58).

The `cell_output` now uses the [logits projected](https://github.com/alrojo/tensorflow/blob/dynamic_decoder/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/decoder_fn.py#L82).

Note: I had to add an extra argument, `num_decoder_symbols`, to the `simple_decoder_fn_inference`.

Please let me know if you have more code blocks that you would like to change.

Furthermore, I assume the only major challenge left (before writing docstrings and building) is the equality test mentioned by @ebrevdo ? (please see latest "requested changes").
